description: Returns a list of third-party applications in a specific security profile.

parameters.name: SecurityProfileId
parameters.description: The identifier for the security profle.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

nested_items.name: Applications
nested_items.description: A list of the third-party application's metadata.

nested_items.name: Namespace
nested_items.description: Namespace of the application that you want to give access to.

nested_items.name: ApplicationPermissions
nested_items.description: The permissions that the agent is granted on the application. Only the ACCESS permission is supported.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If there are additional results, this is the token for the next set of results.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when this resource was last modified.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region where this resource was last modified.
